application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 11c (submission of details - street frontage elevation at scale 1:20 of bike and bin stores in front garden and full details of facing materials including colour) of planning permission ref. PP/23/04238 dated 27th October 2023 (Conversion of mixed use listed building into single residential dwelling; replacement of mansard roof; replacement of windows; installation of solar panels; construction of external bin and cycle storage; external alterations, landscaping and other associated works; internal works including removal of modern fixtures and fittings; installation of partitions, and other associated internal works).
